definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: Was I upset that I didn’t have the opportunity to play much? No doubt.
sentences.chinese: 里奇蒙德回憶，“我有沒有對沒有機會感到失望呢？

sentences.english: No move, however, ranked higher than the drafting of Richmond.
sentences.chinese: 雖然沒有比賽，排名卻要比選中里奇蒙德之前高。

sentences.english: Richmond believes the lending feature will harm authors.
sentences.chinese: 里奇蒙認爲這個“借出”功能將會損害作家的利益。

sentences.english: A weekly concession to Richmond, please.
sentences.chinese: 請辦一張去里奇蒙的學生半價周票。
